SELECT m.id id, m.number number, m.phone phone, m.name name, m.sex sex, m.birthday birthday, m.credits credits, m.ld_level_id ldLevelId, ld.level level, m.state state, m.total_money totalMoney, m.creattime creattime, m.password password, m.evidence evidence FROM t_member m, t_level_discount ld WHERE m.ld_level_id = ld.id AND m.can_use = 0 ORDER BY m.id DESC limit #{page},#{limit}

t.phone = #{phone},
t.name = #{name},
t.sex = #{sex},
t.birthday = #{birthday},
t.state = #{state}
WHERE t.id = #{id}
